keyMoments.description: Buggy sends his first mate Mohji and Richie to find and eliminate Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals organizational structure of Buggy Pirates with Mohji as first mate

keyMoments.description: Mohji, the first mate of the Buggy Pirates, is defeated by Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Another member of the Buggy Pirates defeated

structureReveals.description: Mohji confirmed as first mate of the Buggy Pirates
